Attention please! Are you somebody looking for a new experience?
Are you by any chance a Merakyat who just can't wait for when I'm going to be implementing
a certain feature? Or are you simply wanting to get a head start with flexing using super
amazing badges and cute emojis? Well you're in luck!
My name is Pavolia Reine and I'm going to be here explaining briefly what is going on with Pavolia Reine's membership.
That is mine by the way.
At the Royal Team, our super advanced magical technology grants you badge flexing rights,
which you can constantly show off every time you're here with us.
We also make sure to provide you with utmost care and sense of belonging
by granting you a one-of-a-kind experience with cute emojis.
At just the right price, you'll be able to join our exclusive Royal Tea Parties,
which also means membership-exclusive streams in which we can have various talks,
play games together, and do other miscellaneous member involvements
like what, you might ask?
Only one way to find out
And lastly, safety isn't guaranteed
But it is a part of our character development training
In which we aim to build a community of people who like living dangerously
We welcome everybody with open arms to join the royalty
